_header: Now listen of an gentle knight
_description: William Dunbar, Of Sir Thomas Norray — nine 6-line tail-rhyme stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
Nou Listis of ane gentill knychtSir Thomas nory wyse and
                    wicht…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…For of ane hie Renowned knychtHe wants nothing bott
                    bellis

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Nou lythis off ane gentill knychtSchir thomas norny vys and
                    vycht…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…for off ane hy renowned knychtHe wanttis no thing bot
                    bellis
